scripts.build-client: cd client && npm install --production=false && npm run build
scripts.build-cordova: npm run build-client && rsync -a --delete client/build cordova/www
scripts.run-cordova-ios: npm run build-cordova && cd cordova && cordova run ios
scripts.run-cordova-android: npm run build-cordova && cd cordova && cordova run android
scripts.run-cordova-browser: npm run build-cordova && cd cordova && cordova run browser
scripts.cordova-init: cd cordova && cordova platform add ios && cordova platform add android
scripts.start: concurrently "npm run run-client" "npm run run-server" "npm run run-service-worker"
